languages.text: "Боюсь, не выйдет, Ваша Светлость. Они выжимают из двигателей всю тягу, так им хочется нас прикончить. Извольте приготовиться к бою, Лорд-капитан".
"I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, не выйдет, Ваша Светлость. Они выжимают из двигателей всю тягу, так им хочется нас прикончить. Извольте приготовиться к бою, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid it won't work, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are pushing their engines to the limit, this is how much they want to kill us. Care to prepare for battle, Lord Captain."
"I'm afraid it won't work, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are pushing their engines to the limit, this is how much they want to kill us. Care to prepare for battle, Lord Captain."
"I'm afraid it won't work, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are pushing their engines to the limit, this is how much they want to end us. Care to prepare for battle, Lord Captain?"
"I'm afraid it won't work, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are pushing their engines to the limit, this is how much they want to end us. Care to prepare for battle, Lord Captain?"
"I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

languages.text: “这恐怕行不通，船长老大。他们的引擎正在全速推进，我猜他们是铁了心要整死我们。我相信你已经做好战斗准备了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕行不通，船长老大。他们的引擎正在全速推进，我猜他们是铁了心要整死我们。我相信你已经做好战斗准备了。”

languages.text: « Je crains que ça ne suffise pas, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Ils poussent leurs moteurs au maximum de leurs capacités, c'est dire à quel point ils veulent nous voir morts. Si vous voulez mon avis, nous ferions bien de nous préparer à combattre. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que ça ne suffise pas, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Ils poussent leurs moteurs au maximum de leurs capacités, c'est dire à quel point ils veulent nous voir morts. Si vous voulez mon avis, nous ferions bien de nous préparer à combattre. »

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, das wird nichts werden, Lord Cap'n. Sie bringen ihre Triebwerke an die Grenzen, ich vermute also, dass sie uns unbedingt tot sehen wollen. Ich glaube, wir sollten zum Kampf rüsten."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, das wird nichts werden, Lord Cap'n. Sie bringen ihre Triebwerke an die Grenzen, ich vermute also, dass sie uns unbedingt tot sehen wollen. Ich glaube, wir sollten zum Kampf rüsten."

languages.text: «Me temo que no bastará, Lord Capitán. Están forzando sus motores al máximo, así que está claro que quieren acabar con nosotros. Será mejor prepararnos para el combate».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no bastará, Lord Capitán. Están forzando sus motores al máximo, así que está claro que quieren acabar con nosotros. Será mejor prepararnos para el combate».

languages.text: 「それは無理だと思いますよ、ロード・キャプテン。彼らはエンジンを限界まで酷使しています。我々を殺したいんでしょうね。戦闘準備は整っていると思います」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."

traits.locale_text: 「それは無理だと思いますよ、ロード・キャプテン。彼らはエンジンを限界まで酷使しています。我々を殺したいんでしょうね。戦闘準備は整っていると思います」

languages.text: "Korkarım bu hamle işe yaramayacak Lord Kaptan. Motorlarının sınırlarını zorluyorlar, herhâlde bizi öldürmeye kafayı koymuşlar. Çatışma hazırlıklarına başlasak iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that won't work, Lord Cap'n. They are pushing their engines to the limit, so I guess they really want us dead. I believe combat preparations are in order."
